mapper.select: select * from( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, E.* FROM( SELECT A.BOOK_NUM book_num,A.NAME BOOK_NAME, B.NAME AUTHOR_NAME, PREFERENCE, C.NAME PUB_NAME, NVL(sp,0) SCORE FROM BOOKM A, AUTHOR B, PUBLISHER C, (SELECT AVG(STAR_POINT) SP, BOOK_NUM FROM REVIEW GROUP BY BOOK_NUM) D WHERE A.AUTHOR_NUM = B.NUM AND A.PUB_NUM = C.PUB_NUM AND A.BOOK_NUM = D.BOOK_NUM(+) ORDER BY PREFERENCE DESC) E) where rnum BETWEEN 1 and 5
select sum(A.PREFERENCE) from bookm a, BOOK_CATEGORY b where A.BOOK_NUM = B.BOOK_NUM and cate1_num = #{cate_num} group by B.CATE1_NUM
